thread.title: BRIEF-Riot Blockchain Enters Loi To Acquire Logical Brokerage Corp

title: BRIEF-Riot Blockchain Enters Loi To Acquire Logical Brokerage Corp

organizations.name: loi to acquire logical brokerage corp
corp reuters staff  riot blockchain inc

text:
February 7, 2018 / 1:45 PM / in 17 minutes BRIEF-Riot Blockchain Enters Loi To Acquire Logical Brokerage Corp Reuters Staff 
Riot Blockchain Inc: 
* RIOT BLOCKCHAIN ENTERS LOI TO ACQUIRE LOGICAL BROKERAGE CORP 
* RIOT BLOCKCHAIN INC - INTENDS TO PURSUE LAUNCHING A DIGITAL CURRENCY EXCHANGE AND A FUTURES BROKERAGE OPERATION WITHIN UNITED STATES 
* RIOT BLOCKCHAIN ENTERS LOI TO ACQUIRE LOGICAL BROKERAGE CORP Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
